review.comment:
AMAZING cupcakes, cookies and donuts 🍩
I will be back for sure!
Best bakery
Very friendly service. Reasonable prices for cakes and excellent work. Amazing job on the cake decoration.

I had a bad experience I called them they  said they can’t really help over the phone they only do order’s online I contacted Isabelle one of the co owner’s of the bakery she said she would help me but then hang up on me and I found them to be very rude I don’t suggest this bakery to anyone.
review.review_reply:
Hi Domenic,

We appreciate you reaching out; however we wish you would have emailed us first so we could rectify this issue before a review was made.
We would absolutely never hang up on a customer, perhaps the phone was disconnected or dropped? If the phone was disconnected or the call was dropped, we would not be able to reach you unless you called back or we had your number.
All of our orders are done online via our website, we worked hard and spent a lot of money to be able to provide our customers with this.
We did check our email and noticed that you and your wife sent us an email on May 21st asking for a cake on June 4th. We responded on May 22nd to let you know that we were fully booked for that weekend due to the overflow of covid19 weddings and other custom orders. We made a few suggestions for other options, and mentioned that all custom cakes require at least 3 weeks notice depending on design.
We really hope you can try us again, we would love to create you something amazing and delicious.

review.comment: I had ordered my wedding cake from The Rolling Pin and met with Isabelle. She delivered the cake on time and the cake was delicious. However, the final design was not what was discussed and it was quite disappointing to see just a plain white cake. She missed the main element on the cake which would have made a big difference in appearance. Hope this doesn't happen again and to another customer! Still haven't got a response from her with regards to this situation.

Excellent service and top quality cakes for a very reasonable price! After searching a few places went to Rolling Bin to order a cake and cupcakes for my baby shower I am totally satisfied with my decision, we received so many great compliments about the cakes and cupcakes! Keep up the good work!

i’m not a big sweets person, but this cake was delicious! i got a couple dozen mini cupcakes and the 6” birthday cake and they disappeared quickly.

people especially loved the mini chocolate oreo cakes.

staff was incredibly kind, looking forward to returning!
review.review_reply:
Hi Sanj,

Thank you so much for taking time to write us a review. We are so happy that everyone loved the cake, and cupcakes!

Hi Mario,

Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We really wish we knew why we only received 3 stars, any feedback you could provide us would be amazing. This way we can look into matters, and improve our small business.

review.comment: Delicious doughnuts that are addictive! As a family we've tried The Rolling Pin several times (all those goodies in the pictures attached were not eaten in one visit). We love their doughnuts and squares! It's awesome that they change up the menu weekly so you can try different doughnuts each time. I have ordered their jacked up banana cream pie and it was so delicious! I highly recommend it! While I forgot to take a picture of the squares, I enjoyed all of them so try every flavour! After a certain amount (I think $50) it is tax free so definitely try one of each item if it's your first time. Always going back for more!
review.review_reply:
Chris! Thank you so much for leaving us this review.
The jacked up banana cream pie is one of our favorites - and so underrated! We are so happy you were pleased with your choice. Looking forward to welcoming you back into the bakery for more delicious treats soon!

Hi Nimesh,

Thank you so much for providing us this review. We are so happy that you were happy with your visit. Hope to see you again soon.

review.comment: Great! I loved the place, they have AMAZING staff.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for providing us with this review. We think our staff are pretty amazing too!

review.comment: Great shop that's never open
review.review_reply:
Hi Nicholas,

Sorry that you felt the need to give us 2 stars for our hours, and not our bakery products or staff.

We are closed Monday and Tuesday like most bakeries in the area. We are open Wednesday-Friday from 10-2pm (just for the summer) and Saturday and Sunday from 10-4pm. Hopefully you can make it in sometime this summer, and provide us a review on our baked goods.

review.comment: I bought a apple cranberry pie. Can't wait to try it. The staff was wonderful hope to see you guys again soon.
review.review_reply:
Hi John,

Thank you so much for supporting our small business! I love that apple cranberry pie - sweet and the perfect amount of tart.

Hi there,

If you can provide us some feedback as to why we you gave us 3 stars, that would be super helpful. We always welcome constructive criticism, that is how we can continue growing and improving our craft.

review.comment: Fantastic, everything was great. Vanessa is amazing and she always goes over and above.
review.review_reply:
Tony,

That is so sweet of you to say! Thank you so much for your kind words. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!
Mariuxi, Thank you so much for providing us with this review. We are so glad you enjoyed your visit and our bakery products.

review.comment: Best frosting in town and dough and batter and anything sweet

Cake design turned out as expected and everyone at the party raved about the taste and most importantly my mother loved the cake. Thank you Rolling Pin for making my mother's 80th birthday a momentous occasion.
Amazing variety of delicious pastries at a great price.

We got a donut wedding cake (6 inch cake + 10 dozen mini donuts) from Rolling Pin for our wedding in April 2022 and the entire experience from front to back was pretty great. Not only were the cake and donuts absolutely scrumptious, Isabelle and her team in store were lovely to work with as well. Our guests were raving about the donuts for weeks after the wedding – we only had ~70 guests and yet, managed to finish 120 mini donuts (!!) so clearly, they were a huge hit.

Rolling Pin made it easy to pick up a complimentary wedding cake tasting box (all 4 flavours we tried were delicious, in the end, chocolate won out) and let us pick 10 different flavours of donuts for the rest of the “cake”. We love that the flavours are all really unique and well balanced (nothing was ever too sweet) and of course, the donuts are obviously beautiful. We asked for a naked cake to go with our relatively simple décor and the cake was also delicious – really moist, rich, chocolatey … everything you’d want in a chocolate cake, really. I’m so pleased with how the cake and dessert table turned out (thank you to our planner and decor dream team, Claudia Cole and A Lavish Affair for presenting everything so beautifully).

Thank you Rolling Pin for helping us with our wedding cake and dessert table 😊 I’m just itching for another opportunity to get more cake and/or donuts.
review.review_reply:
Jessica,
Thank you so much for your kind words. It means a lot to us that you allowed us to be apart of your special day. Claudia Cole is one of our favorites to work with - so that was a match made in heaven.
Looking forward in creating something sweet for you in the future!

review.comment: I order online.. i didn't expect much when o asked for some customisation... But they did it so nicely. Definitely above my expectations and the cake tasted great too.
I sometimes wake up craving for their donuts! It's one of those things that you can't have enough of. I haven't tried anything else, a cake once, but it wasn't nearly as good as the donuts. MUST TRY!

Recently purchased a custom birthday cake. Wonderful service--very professional and friendly. Cake was a big hit!!! Delicious!!! Would definitely recommend the Rolling Pin for custom cakes and all their tasty pies and donuts.

Ohhh my gosh...the best zeppole ever.
Bought the variety 6 pack. There were leftovers so l placed them in the freezer. Well, let me tell you that once you take them out of the freezer for a bit...it's the best ice cream sandwich you'll experience...Imo...try it. You won't be disappointed 🥳

We went with the Rolling Pin for our wedding after trying their cake at a wedding show. We knew after tasting the sample, that they were the best bakers in the GTA to do our wedding cake. As a baseball loving couple, we wanted to incorporate our favourite team, the Toronto Blue Jays, into our cake. We had a specific vision for what we wanted and they made it happen! The cake turned out VERY beautiful and was so delicious.  It looked exactly like we wanted it to and received many compliments.  We would recommend The Rolling Pin for any events that you want a cake for!

The Rolling Pin is a perennial favourite.  We visit often, and have fallen in love with all of their creations.  We were lucky enough to have them create the most perfect wedding cake for us - the macaron tower I had always dreamed of.  Being a macaron enthusiast, I can categorically state that the macarons at The Rolling Pin were that perfect balance between crispy and soft inside, not too sugary and closely resembling Laduree quality (which is who invented macarons - so that's a high compliment!).

The cake itself was super delicious as well, fluffy, delicious and with distinctive flavours that I hadn't found anywhere else.

The consultation was easy, delivery was seamless, and the entire experience was a delight.

Will always highly recommend them - thanks for making our day memorable!

My husband and I sampled a few bakeries when considering our wedding cake. It wasn't even a question which bakery to choose...The Rolling Pin won in a landslide. Though we wanted our cake to look nice, the most important factors for us were taste and texture. Their cakes were so good, we couldn't choose one flavour. So we chose a different flavour for all three tiers! Best decision ever.

There is not a single thing I would change about our wedding cake. They did exactly what we wanted visually and it is, to this day, the most delicious cake we've had. Even the event staff at the venue were asking us if they could take pieces home. Definitely a 5-star wedding cake!
review.review_reply:
Hi Talia,

Thank you so much for these kind words. We are so happy we were able to be apart of your special day. Looking forward to many more sweet milestones with you guys.

Hi there,

I am not sure why a 1 star was posted without any information as to why. We would love to know how we can improve our service, or improve our products. Please let us know the reasoning behind this, so we can work hard to rectify any issues that you may have had. We take these reviews seriously as a small business, and would like to improve if we can.

Thank you,
The Rolling Pin Team

review.comment: The Rolling Pin I would say has the tastiest cakes/desserts I have ever had. Back in 2015 my husband and I were getting married and The Rolling Pin was just starting out, they have opened up there first shop! We met them at the wedding show, our experience with them started from there. We delt more with Vanessa at the time but both ladies are wonderful, we went in for a cake tasting and boy it was delish, they offered every flavour they had and it was so so yummy! We decided on two flavours I cant quite remember the flavours we picked, but I have guest still talking about how tasty it was, not only tasty but the cake was stunning!! More then what we were expecting. Our experience over all was amazing trust me The Rolling Pin will not disappoint!! Amazing Job Ladies!!

Ordered 2 large and 1 small cupcake bouquets for a together at the office.  Not only are the cupcake bouquets absolutely gorgeous,  but they are also delicious.   They were perfect in every way.  I also have to thank the great ladies at The Rolling Pin, they were friendly and over the top accommodating.    Given the huge hit the cupcakes were, we will definitely be back.  Thank you again for everything, can't thank you enough.

I ordered from the Rolling Pin for my wedding and it was amazing! It was so easy to go in and try the initial flavors and they were super receptive to the style of cake we wanted! We showed style inspiration pictures of simple white cake with silver paint strokes and they executed it perfectly. We went with a banana dulce cake which was soooo delicious! 100% will be buying for cakes from them in the future!

My  husband and I did not opt for the traditional wedding cake. Instead we had the most amazing donut tower with a smaller wedding cake on top. The Rolling Pin exceeded our expectations! The donut tower wedding cake was the star of the show, not one donut was left over. The cake at the top was moist and stunning. We loved it so much that we had the cake recreated for our first wedding anniversary.

It was so easy to working with the Rolling Pin, they took care of the delivery and set up. The taste test was the cherry on the top!

Thank you Rolling Pin!

The Rolling Pin is my favorite bakery in the City, so we absolutely had to choose them for our wedding cake! They were easy to communicate with and accommodating to what we had in mind for a design. They were very organized and also had lots of ideas to share. The taste testing was simple, fun and we felt no pressure on having to pick them for our day. The design was exactly what we had envisioned and matched our colour scheme perfectly. All of our guests raved about the delicious chocolate cake. We still visit regularly when we need a treat!

Isabelle, Vanessa and the team at The Rolling Pin not only create the most DELICIOUS donuts, cakes and pies, but throughout our covid wedding planning experience, they were nothing but helpful and patient with all of our changing orders. Our wedding cake was a donut tower with cake on top and it was absolutely PERFECT! Their chocolate fudge cake can't be beat! I selfishly had hoped there would be leftovers for the week, but not with this cake! haha! Thanks again!

We had an amazing experience for our wedding! Our cake was exactly what we were looking for, and it was delicious. Everyone loved the look and flavour. We received so many compliments on it. 100% will come back for more.

On March 24th, I emailed the rolling pin and asked for a “Drunken Cherry” chocolate cake and attached an image of a fudge cake with cherries (No icing/frosting). I was told by Vanessa that the rolling pin would make this cake for me for my birthday and that the price for a 9” cake would be $145. Although pricey, I agreed since I thought this would be exactly what I asked for and hopefully worth the price. You would assume that for this price the cake would at least have real cherries. Instead, what I received for $145 was an overpriced Black Forest cake that I could have easily gotten from a random grocery story for $40. At my birthday party of 20 people, I sliced into my cake and felt immediate disappointment. What I saw was a chocolate cake (overly sweet with no flavour) with dollar store quality maraschino cherries and a thick layer of frosting. No one ate the cake because it tasted like sweet garbage. One bite = 1 cavity. Instead of putting a $145 price tag on the box, there should be a health warning label.

Initially, I really did not want to post this review and emailed Vanessa to express disappointment. I did not expect anything in return aside from an acknowledgment email and maybe an apology. However, just like the rest of the negative comments here say, Customer service sucks even more than the cakes, which is pretty hard to do.

Will not be returning.
Great bakery, I originally went there for a Nutella donut but unfortunately I did not see it.
Low selection of donuts when I visited in the morning.
Cozy place and quick service
We bought Cherry Pie yesterday and for me it’s one of the most delicious pies I’ve had in a while. It was more on the expensive side, but it was really good.

OMG!! IF YOU HAVEN'T TRIED THEIR CAKES... YOU ARE MISSING OUT! Vanessa took good care of me for my mom's birthday! She did up an AMAZING cake.... The quality was second to none... DELICIOUS! YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED!

An impressive selection of mouth watering donuts. The unique flavor combinations will keep you coming back again and again. In addition, I was served by a friendly and sweet staff member who was very knowledgeable about the items. Will definitely be back!
Great custom cakes!
Best donuts in town.
